text: h<MER>woy mo<SIL>r@'A<TIP>h w@nig@'AlA<ATN>h hA`i<TIP>yr hay*wonA<SIL>h:

W/ׂArE<MUN>yhA b@qir@b*A<ZQP>h* '<HPA>rAy<TIP>wot W/.o<SIL>'<HPA>gi<ATN>ym W/.o<SIL>p@TE<AZL>yhA<PAS> z@'e<MUN>bey `E<ZQP>rEb lo<MER>' gA<SIL>r@m<TIP>w* lab*o<SIL>qEr:
n@biy'E<AZL>yhA<PAS> p*o<SIL>x<HPA>zi<ZQP>ym 'an@W/.e<TIP>y b*o<SIL>g@d<ATN>wot k*o<SIL>h<HPA>nE<AZL>yhA<PAS> xil*@lw*=qo<ZQP>dEW/. xA<SIL>m@s<TIP>w* t*worA<SIL>h:

y@hwA<MEH>h Yad*iyq<PAS> b*@qir@b*A<ZQP>h* lo<MER>' ya<SIL>`<HPA>W/ׂE<TIP>h `aw@lA<ATN>h b*ab*o<AZL>qEr b*ab*o<GER>qEr miW/.@p*AT<AZL>wo yit*e<MEH>n lA'wor<PAS> lo<MUN>' nE`@d*A<ZQP>r w@lo<SIL>'=ywode<MER>`a `aw*A<TIP>l b*o<SIL>W/.Et:

hik@ra<MUN>t*iy gwoyi<RBM>m nAW/.a<AZL>m*w*<PAS> p*in*wotA<ZQP>m hE<SIL>x<HSE>ra<MER>b@t*iy x<SIL>w*YwotA<TIP>m mib*@li<MUN>y `wobe<ATN>r niY@d*<DAR>w* `A<SIL>reyhE<TEB>m mib*@liy='i<TIP>yW/. me'e<MER>yn ywoW/.e<SIL>b:

'Ama<GER>r@t*iy 'ak@=t*i<SIL>yr@'i<MEH>y 'wotiy<PAS> t*iq@xi<MUN>y mw*sA<ZQP>r w@lo<SIL>'=yik*Are<MUN>t m@`wonA<ZQP>h* k*o<MER>l '<HPA>W/.Er=p*Aqa<TIP>d@t*iy `AlE<ATN>yhA 'Aken<PAS> hiW/.@k*i<MUN>ymw* hiW/.@xi<ZQP>ytw* k*o<TIP>l `<HPA>li<SIL>ylwotA<SIL>m:

lAke<MEH>n xak*w*=liy<PAS> n@'um=y@hwA<ZQP>h l@y<TIP>wom qw*mi<MUN>y l@`a<ATN>d k*i<MUN>y miW/.@p*ATiy<TLP> lE<SIL>'<HSE>so<AZL>p g*woyi<GER>m l@qAb@Yi<MUN>y mam@lAk<RBM>wot liW/.@p*o<AZL>k@ `<HPA>leyhE<MEH>m za`@miy<PAS> k*o<YET>l x<HPA>r<MUN>won 'ap*i<ZQP>y k*i<YET>y b*@'e<MUN>W/. qin@'Ati<ZQP>y t*e<SIL>'Ake<TIP>l k*Al=hA'A<SIL>rEY:
k*iy='A<TEB>z 'Eh@p*o<MER>k@ 'El=`am*i<TIP>ym W/ׂApA<MUN>h b@rw*rA<ATN>h liq@ro<MEH>' kul*Am<PAS> b*@W/.e<MUN>m y@hwA<ZQP>h l@`Ab@d<TIP>wo W/.@kE<MER>m 'ExA<SIL>d:
me`e<TIP>bEr l@na<SIL>h<HPA>rey=k<ATN>w*W/. `<HPA>tAray<PAS> b*at=p*w*Ya<ZQP>y ywobil<TIP>w*n min@xAti<SIL>y:

b*ay*<MUN>wom hah<RBM>w*' lo<MEH>' teb<AZL>woW/.iy<PAS> mik*o<MUN>l `<HPA>li<SIL>ylota<ZQP>yik@ '<HPA>W/.E<MER>r p*AW/.a<TIP>`at*@ b*i<ATN>y k*iy='A<MUN>z | 'Asi<MUN>yr miq*ir@b*e<RBM>k@ `al*iyzey<PAS> g*a<SIL>'<HPA>wAte<ZQP>k@ w@lo<SIL>'=twosi<DAR>piy l@gAb@hA<TEB>h `<TIP>wod b*@ha<MER>r qAd@W/.i<SIL>y:
w@hiW/.@'ar@t*i<MUN>y b@qir@b*e<ZQP>k@ `a<MER>m `Ani<TIP>y wAdA<ATN>l w@xAs<TIP>w* b*@W/.e<MER>m y@hwA<SIL>h:

W/.@'eri<AZL>yt yiW/ׂ@rA'e<GER>l lo<SIL>'=ya`<HPA>W/ׂ<MEH>w* `aw@lAh<PAS> w@lo<SIL>'=y@dab*@r<MUN>w* kAzA<ZQP>b w@lo<SIL>'=yim*AYe<MER>' b*@piyhE<TIP>m l@W/.<MUN>won t*ar@mi<ATN>yt k*iy=he<TEB>m*Ah yir@`<MER>w* w@rA<SIL>b@Y<TIP>w* w@'e<MER>yn ma<SIL>x<HPA>ri<SIL>yd:
rAn*iy<PAS> b*at=Yiy*<ZQP>won hAri<TIP>y`w* yiW/ׂ@rA'e<ATN>l W/ׂim@xi<MEH>y w@`Al@ziy<PAS> b*@kAl=le<ZQP>b b*a<TIP>t y@r<SIL>w*W/.AlA<SIL>im:
hesi<MEH>yr y@hwAh<PAS> miW/.@p*ATa<ZQP>yik@ p*in*A<TIP>h 'o<SIL>y@be<ATN>k@ mE<MUN>lEk@ yiW/ׂ@rA'e<MEH>l | y@hwAh<PAS> b*@qir@b*e<ZQP>k@ lo'=ti<SIL>yr@'i<MER>y rA<TIP>` `<SIL>wod:
b*ay*<MUN>wom hah<ZQP>w*' ye<SIL>'Ame<MER>r liyr<SIL>w*W/.Ala<TIP>im 'al=t*iyrA<ATN>'iy Yiy*<TIP>won 'al=yir@p*<MER>w* yAdA<SIL>yik@:

y@hwA<DAR>h '<HSE>loha<TEB>yik@ b*@qir@b*e<TIP>k@ g*ib*<MUN>wor ywoW/.i<ATN>y`a yAW/ׂi<AZL>yW/ׂ `Ala<GER>yik@ b*@W/ׂim@xA<RBM>h ya<SIL>x<HPA>riyW/.<PAS> b*@'a<MUN>h<HPA>bAt<ZQP>wo yAgi<MER>yl `Ala<TIP>yik@ b*@rin*A<SIL>h:
nw*ge<DAR>y mim*wo`e<TEB>d 'Asa<TIP>p@t*iy mim*e<MUN>k@ hAy<ATN>w* maW/ׂ@'e<MER>t `AlE<TIP>yhA xEr@p*A<SIL>h:

hin@ni<MER>y `oW/ׂE<TEB>h 'Et=k*Al=m@`an*a<TIP>yik@ b*A`e<MUN>t hahi<ATN>y' w@h<SIL>woW/.a`@t*i<MUN>y 'Et=haY*o<SIL>le`A<RBM>h w@han*id*AxAh<PAS> '<HPA>qab*e<ZQP>Y w@W/ׂam@t*iym<PAS> lit@hil*A<MUN>h w*l@W/.e<ZQP>m b*@kAl=hA'A<TIP>rEY b*AW/.@t*A<SIL>m:

b*A`e<MEH>t hahiy'<PAS> 'Abi<MUN>y' 'Et@kE<ZQP>m w*bA`e<TIP>t qab*@Yi<MUN>y 'Et@kE<ATN>m k*i<SIL>y='Et*e<AZL>n 'Et@kE<GER>m l@W/.e<MUN>m w@lit@hil*A<RBM>h b*@kol<PAS> `am*e<MUN>y hA'A<ZQP>rEY b*@W/.w*bi<DAR>y 'Et=W/.@b<SIL>w*teykE<TEB>m l@`e<SIL>yneykE<TIP>m 'Ama<MER>r y@hwA<SIL>h:
hi<SIL>t@qwoW/.@W/.<TIP>w* wAq<ATN>woW/*.w* hag*<TIP>woy lo<MER>' nik@sA<SIL>p:

b*@TE<AZL>rEm<PAS> lE<MUN>dEt xo<ZQP>q k*@mo<TIP>Y `A<MUN>bar y<ATN>wom b*@TE<MUN>rEm | lo<SIL>'=yAb<MUN>wo' `<HPA>leykE<RBM>m x<HPA>rwon<PAS> 'ap=y@hwA<ZQP>h b*@TE<AZL>rEm<PAS> lo<SIL>'=yAb<MUN>wo' `<HPA>leykE<ZQP>m y<TIP>wom 'ap=y@hwA<SIL>h:

b*aq*@W/.<MEH>w* 'Et=y@hwAh<PAS> k*Al=`an@we<MUN>y hA'A<ZQP>rEY '<HPA>W/.E<MER>r miW/.@p*AT<TIP>wo p*A`A<ATN>lw* b*aq*@W/.w*=YE<AZL>dEq<PAS> b*aq*@W/.<MUN>w* `<HPA>nAwA<ZQP>h 'w*lay<PAS> t*is*A<MUN>t@r<ZQP>w* b*@y<TIP>wom 'ap=y@hwA<SIL>h:

k*i<MEH>y `az*Ah<PAS> `<HPA>zw*bA<MUN>h ti<SIL>h@yE<ZQP>h w@'aW/.@q@l<TIP>won liW/.@mAmA<ATN>h 'aW/.@d*<RBM>wod b*a<SIL>Y*Ah<HQA>ra<AZL>yim<PAS> y@gA<MUN>r@W/.<ZQP>w*hA w@`Eq@r<TIP>won t*e<SIL>`Aqe<SIL>r:

h<RBM>woy yo<SIL>W/.@be<TEB>y xE<MER>bEl hay*A<TIP>m g*<MUN>woy k*@reti<ATN>ym d*@bar=y@hwA<MUN>h `<HPA>leykE<RBM>m k*@na<AZL>`an<PAS> 'E<MUN>rEY p*@liW/.@t*i<ZQP>ym w@ha<SIL>'<HPA>bad@t*i<TIP>yk@ me'e<MER>yn ywoW/.e<SIL>b:
w@<SIL>hAy@tA<GAR>h xE<MUN>bEl hay*A<RBM>m n@w<TEB>͏ot k*@ro<MER>t ro`i<TIP>ym w@gid@r<MER>wot Yo<SIL>'n:

w@hA<MUN>yAh xE<RBM>bEl liW/.@'eri<TEB>yt b*e<MER>yt y@hw*dA<TIP>h `<HPA>leyhE<MUN>m yir@`<ATN>w*n b*@bAt*e<MUN>y 'aW/.@q@l<RBM>won b*A`E<AZL>rEb<PAS> yir@b*AY<ZQP>w*n k*i<DAR>y yip@q@de<TEB>m y@hwA<MER>h '<HSE>lo<SIL>heyhE<TIP>m w@W/.A<MER>b W/bwtm (W/.@biytA<SIL>m):
W/.Ama<AZL>`@t*iy<PAS> xEr@p*a<MUN>t mwo'A<ZQP>b w@gid*upe<TIP>y b*@ne<MUN>y `am*<ATN>won '<HPA>W/.E<MEH>r xe<SIL>r@pw*<PAS> 'Et=`am*i<ZQP>y way*ag@d*i<TIP>ylw* `al=g*@bw*lA<SIL>m:

lAke<MUN>n xay='A<PAZ>niy n@'um<TLP> y@hwA<AZL>h Y@bA'<GER>wot '<HSE>lohe<MUN>y yiW/ׂ@rA'e<RBM>l k*i<SIL>y=mwo'A<GAR>b k*is@do<MEH>m t*i<SIL>h@yEh<PAS> w*b@ne<MEH>y `am*won<PAS> k*a<SIL>`<HPA>morA<ZQP>h mim@W/.a<MER>q xAr<TEB>w*l w*mik@reh=mE<MER>lax w*W/.@mAmA<TIP>h `ad=`wolA<ATN>m W/.@'eri<MEH>yt `am*iy<PAS> y@bAz*<ZQP>w*m w@yE<MER>tEr g*woyi<TIP> yin@xAl<SIL>w*m:
zo<MER>'t lAhE<TIP>m t*a<MUN>xat g*@'wonA<ATN>m k*i<MEH>y xe<SIL>r@pw*<PAS> way*ag@d*i<ZQP>lw* `al=`a<TIP>m y@hwA<MER>h Y@bA'<SIL>wot:

nworA<MEH>' y@hwAh<PAS> `<HPA>leyhE<ZQP>m k*i<MUN>y rAzA<ZQP>h 'e<TIP>t k*Al='<HSE>lohe<MUN>y hA'A<ATN>rEY w@yiW/.@t*a<SIL>x<HPA>ww*=lwo<PAS> 'i<MUN>yW/. mim*@qwom<ZQP>wo k*o<TIP>l 'iy*e<MER>y hag*woyi<SIL>m:
g*am='at*E<MUN>m k*w*W/.i<ZQP>ym xa<SIL>l@le<MER>y xar@b*i<TIP>y he<SIL>m*Ah:
w@ye<MEH>T yAdwo<PAS> `al=YAp<ZQP>won wi<SIL>y'ab*e<TIP>d 'Et='aW/*.<ATN>w*r w@yAW/ׂe<MEH>m 'Et=ni<SIL>yn@weh<PAS> liW/.@mAmA<ZQP>h Yiy*A<TIP>h k*am*id@b*A<SIL>r:

w@rA<SIL>b@Y<AZL>w* b@twokA<MEH>h* `<HPA>dAriym<PAS> k*Al=xay@two=g<ZQP>woy g*am=qA'at<PAS> g*am=qip*o<ZQP>d b*@kap@t*orE<TIP>yhA yAli<ATN>ynw* q<TLM>wol y@W/.wore<MEH>r b*a<SIL>xal*won<PAS> xo<MUN>rEb b*as*a<ZQP>p k*i<MER>y 'ar@zA<TIP>h `erA<SIL>h:

zo<TLM><GAR>'t hA`i<MEH>yr hA<SIL>`al*iyzAh<PAS> hay*woW/.E<MUN>bEt lAbE<ZQP>Tax hA'o<SIL>m@rAh<PAS> b*il@bAbA<ZQP>h* '<HPA>ni<TIP>y w@'ap@si<MUN>y `<ATN>wod 'e<MUN>yk@ | hA<SIL>y@tA<MUN>h l@W/.am*A<RBM>h mar@b*eY<PAS> la<SIL>xay*A<ZQP>h k*o<YET>l `wobe<MUN>r `AlE<ZQP>yhA yiW/.@ro<TIP>q yAni<MER>y`a yAd<SIL>wo:

d*@bar=y@hwA<MUN>h | '<HPA>W/.E<MUN>r hAyA<RBM>h 'El=Y@pan@yAh<PAS> b*En=k*w*W/.i<MUN>y bEn=g*@dal@yA<ZQP>h b*En='<HPA>mar@yA<TIP>h b*En=xiz@qiy*A<ATN>h b*iyme<TEB>y yo<SIL>'W/.iy*A<MER>hw* bEn='Am<TIP>won mE<MER>lEk@ y@hw*dA<SIL>h:
'Aso<AZL>p 'Ase<GER>p k*o<RBM>l me`a<TEB>l p*@ne<MER>y hA<SIL>'<HPA>dAmA<TIP>h n@'um=y@hwA<SIL>h:

'Ase<AZL>p 'AdA<GER>m w*b@hemA<RBM>h 'Ase<MEH>p `wop=haW/*.Ama<AZL>yim<PAS> w*d@ge<MUN>y hay*A<ZQP>m w@ham*ak@W/.el<TIP>wot 'Et=hA<SIL>r@W/.A`i<ATN>ym w@hik@rat*i<MUN>y 'Et=hA<SIL>'AdA<RBM>m me`a<TEB>l p*@ne<MER>y hA<SIL>'<HPA>dAmA<TIP>h n@'um=y@hwA<SIL>h:

w@nATi<MEH>ytiy yAdiy<PAS> `al=y@hw*dA<ZQP>h w@`a<TIP>l k*Al=y<SIL>woW/.@be<MUN>y y@r<SIL>w*W/.AlA<ATN>im w@hik@rat*i<GAR>y min=ham*Aq<MEH>wom haz*Eh<PAS> 'Et=W/.@'A<MUN>r hab*a<ZQP>`al 'Et=W/.e<MER>m hak*@mAri<TIP>ym `im=hak*o<SIL>h<HPA>ni<SIL>ym:

w@'Et=ham*iW/.@t*a<SIL>x<HPA>wi<MER>ym `al=hag*ag*<TIP>wot liY@bA<MUN>' haW/*.AmA<ATN>yim w@'Et=ham*i<SIL>W/.@t*ax<HPA>wiym<PAS> han*iW/.@b*A`i<MUN>ym la<SIL>yhwA<ZQP>h w@han*iW/.@b*A`i<TIP>ym b*@mal@k*A<SIL>m:
w@'Et=han*@swogi<TIP>ym me'a<SIL>x<HPA>re<MUN>y y@hwA<ATN>h wa<SIL>'<HPA>W/.E<TEB>r lo<SIL>'=biq@W/.<MER>w* 'Et=y@hwA<TIP>h w@lo<MER>' d@rAW/.u<SIL>hw*:
ha<ZQM>s mip*@ne<TIP>y '<HPA>donA<MUN>y y@hwi<ATN>h k*i<MEH>y qArwob<PAS> y<MUN>wom y@hwA<ZQP>h k*i<SIL>y=heki<DAR>yn y@hwA<TEB>h zE<TIP>bax hiq@d*i<MER>yW/. q@ru'A<SIL>yw:
w@hAyA<RBM>h b*@ywom<PAS> zE<MUN>bax y@hwA<ZQP>h w*pA<SIL>qad@t*i<MER>y `al=haW/*ׂAri<TIP>ym w@`al=b*@ne<MUN>y ham*E<ATN>lEk@ w@`a<MER>l k*Al=hal*o<SIL>b@W/.i<TIP>ym mal@b*<MER>w*W/. nAk@ri<SIL>y:
w*pA<SIL>qad@t*i<RBM>y `a<DAR>l k*Al=had*wole<TEB>g `al=ham*ip@t*A<TIP>n b*ay*<MUN>wom hah<ATN>w*' ha<SIL>m@mal@'i<TEB>ym b*e<MER>yt '<HPA>do<SIL>neyhE<TIP>m xAmA<MER>s w*mir@mA<SIL>h:

w@hAyAh<TLP> bay*<AZL>wom hah<GER>w*' n@'um=y@hwA<RBM>h q<MEH>wol Y@`AqAh<PAS> miW/*.a<MUN>`ar had*Agi<ZQP>ym wi<SIL>ylAlA<TIP>h min=ham*iW/.@nE<ATN>h w@W/.E<MER>bEr g*Ad<TIP>wol me<SIL>hag*@bA`<SIL>wot:
heyli<TIP>ylw* yo<SIL>W/.@be<MUN>y ham*ak@t*e<ATN>W/. k*i<MEH>y nid@mAh<PAS> k*Al=`a<MUN>m k*@na<ZQP>`an nik@r@t<TIP>w* k*Al=n@Ti<MER>yley kA<SIL>sEp:

w@hAyAh<PAS> b*A`e<MUN>t hahi<ZQP>y' '<HPA>xap*e<MER>W/ׂ 'Et=y@r<SIL>w*W/.Ala<TIP>im b*an*er<ATN>wot w*pA<SIL>qad@t*i<MUN>y `al=hA<SIL>'<HPA>nAW/.i<RBM>ym haq*o<SIL>p@'iym<PAS> `al=W/.im@reyhE<ZQP>m hA'o<SIL>m@riym<PAS> b*il@bAbA<ZQP>m lo<SIL>'=yeyTi<MER>yb y@hwA<TIP>h w@lo<MER>' yAre<SIL>`a:

w@hAyA<MEH>h xeylAm<PAS> lim@W/.is*A<ZQP>h w*bA<SIL>t*eyhE<TIP>m liW/.@mAmA<ATN>h w*bAn<MEH>w* bAt*iym<PAS> w@lo<MUN>' yeW/.e<ZQP>bw* w@nA<SIL>T@`<MUN>w* k@rAmi<ZQP>ym w@lo<MER>' yiW/.@t*<TIP>w* 'Et=yeynA<SIL>m:
qAr<MEH>wob ywom=y@hwAh<PAS> hag*Ad<ZQP>wol qAr<TIP>wob w*mahe<MUN>r m@'o<ATN>d q<YET>wol y<MUN>wom y@hwA<ZQP>h ma<MER>r Yore<TIP>xa W/.A<MER>m g*ib*<SIL>wor:

y<MER>wom `Eb@rA<TIP>h hay*<MUN>wom hah<ATN>w*' y<DAR>wom YArA<MUN>h w*m@Yw*qA<RBM>h y<MEH>wom W/.o'Ah<PAS> w*m@W/.wo'A<ZQP>h y<MER>wom xo<AZL>W/.Ek@<PAS> wa<SIL>'<HPA>pelA<ZQP>h y<MER>wom `AnA<TIP>n wa<SIL>`<HPA>rApE<SIL>l:
y<MER>wom W/.wopA<TIP>r w*t@rw*`A<ATN>h `a<YET>l hE<SIL>`Ari<MUN>ym hab*@Yur<ZQP>wot w@`a<TIP>l hap*in*<MER>wot hag*@boh<SIL>wot:

wa<SIL>h<HPA>Yero<MUN>tiy lA<SIL>'AdA<RBM>m w@hA<SIL>l@kw*<PAS> k*a<SIL>`iw@ri<ZQP>ym k*i<MER>y la<SIL>yhwA<TIP>h xATA<ATN>'w* w@W/.up*a<MEH>k@ d*AmAm<PAS> k*E<SIL>`ApA<ZQP>r w*l@xumA<TIP>m k*ag*@lAli<SIL>ym:

g*am=k*as@p*A<AZL>m g*am=z@hAbA<GER>m lo<SIL>'=yw*ka<MUN>l l@haY*iylA<RBM>m b*@ywom<PAS> `Eb@ra<MUN>t y@hwA<ZQP>h w*b@'eW/.<PAS> qin@'At<ZQP>wo t*e<SIL>'Ake<TIP>l k*Al=hA'A<ATN>rEY k*i<SIL>y=kAlA<MEH>h 'ak@=nib@hAlAh<PAS> ya<SIL>`<HPA>W/ׂE<ZQP>h 'e<MER>t k*Al=yo<SIL>W/.@be<TIP>y hA'A<SIL>rEY:
